choose_carefully: Choose it carefully as you cannot change it later
confirm_existence: We need to confirm if you really exists
confirm_password: Please type your password to confirm it.
confirm_username: You can't change your username once you set it. Are you sure you want to set {username} as your username?
email_verified: Your email address has been verified.
enjoy_steem: You can now enjoy Steem and all its features.
error_api_create_account: An error occurred while creating the account
error_api_domain_blacklisted: This domain name is blacklisted, please provide another email
error_api_phone_too_many: Too many attempts, please request a new code
error_api_wait: Please wait at least one minute between retries
error_confirmation_code_required: 'Please input the code you have received
error_recaptcha_required: Please validate the recaptcha is required
error_username_taken: The username you chose {username} has already been taken, please choose another one.
error_validation_account_alpha: Account name should have only letters, digits, or dashes
error_validation_account_dash: Account name should have only one dash in a row
error_validation_account_end: Account name should end with a letter or digit
error_validation_account_start: Each account segment should start with a letter
error_validation_account_segment_alpha: Each account segment should have only letters, digits, or dashes
error_validation_account_segment_dash: Each account segment should have only one dash in a row
error_validation_account_segment_end: Each account segment should end with a letter or digit
error_validation_account_segment_min: Each account segment should be longer
error_validation_account_segment_start: Each account segment should start with a letter
finish_text_1: You're few steps aways from getting to the top of the list. Check your email and click the email validation link.
finish_text_2: After validating your sign up request with us we'll look it over for approval. As soon as your turn is up and you're approved, you'll be sent a link to finalize your account!
finish_text_3: You'll be among the earliest members of the Steem community!
please_confirm: Please enter the code below to confirm it.
save_password_text: If you ever lose your password, your account will be irreversibly lost. We do not have your password and cannot help you recover it.
send_sms: We need to send you a quick text.
sms_code: We have sms you the code to {phoneNumber} {editLink}
username_available: Good news! The username {username} is available.
username_know: Your username is how you will be known
